column5: hi i was just wondering what the ice conditions are for st. john. Also i would like to know how to get there from the 400 coming from alliston. please let me know thanks bigredfisher. Ps:: if anyone would like to join us feel free to pm me. thanks bigredfisher
can anyone tell me how to get there thanks
I would give it a little time I am sure that if anyone reads this and has info they will post

No idea about ice conditions, but getting there is easy.  Just past Casino Rama in Longford Mills there is a road that takes you right to the Lake.  Google maps with the satellite feature works great too.

I would not recommend going to johns for a couple days......the shore ice at the plant is gone and you have to walk across water to get on the ice and airport is the same. We walked over 3ft of water on logs just to get out onto the ice. Believe me its not worth the walk out there.
Not like theres ENOUGH PEOPLE OUT THERE ALREADY.  But really I dont give a   . Eat all you want.
If the weather forecast holds up, it's probably not too bad by Thursday (do'nt forget to renew your license!)...directions posted above...looks like you're good to go!
